author: Gareth Thomas
comment: Used to be a much better app until a big change last year. Now I check in far less often because it's clunkier or it just cannot find my location.

author: ehsan e
comment: Send friend requests is a big issue in this app. What is this privacy you put in such a social application? Why cant we send infinite friend requests as we do in instagram??!!! I alreafy had uninstalled this app because of this issue but some friend told me issue has resolved and they delete your outstanding requests and you can add new frinds in new version, but when i want to delete old requests i face the message " something went wrong while trying to delete old requests"...and im going to uninstall it forever

author: John Perigo
comment: Is it broke AGAIN??? NOT posting pics to social media AGAIN. Seems like this happens every couple of months. Hope it gets fixed AGAIN.

author: KingGigabyte
comment: This app has literally saved my butt on a huge road trip. I'd feel lost without it honestly. It also makes me feel safer knowing if something happened to me people could see the last place I was

author: Beverly Jones-Butler
comment: Not happy because it keep giving me one point for places I submitted pictures as proof of being there.

author: Filippo Diotalevi
comment: Used to love it, thousands of check-ins and now after one of the latest updates doesn't work for me anymore - doesn't let me check in

author: Steve Cannon
comment: Unable to get suggested check-ins since last update.

author: Dan Yeh
comment: This app is getting worse ! It's basically useless indoors, under a tree, inside the car, anywhere you don't have a line of sight to Jupiter or not in open expanse of Siberia. (Here maps, google maps app all work with lesser hassle).

author: Brian Postel
comment: It just keeps getting worse with each update.

author: Twesigomwe Darius
comment: I cant check in. It literally can't find where i am

author: Konstantin Raspopov
comment: Cannot check-in at all after last update

author: jed carandang
comment: This app sucks ! It's not even loading on my end.

author: Tin Ymmanuel
comment: what happened? location does not load at all

author: Ram Ii
comment: Good idea with worst implementation

author: Dilip CS
comment: Check in suggestions not working.

author: Matthew Knight
comment: Stopped suggesting checkins

author: Özgen Bektas
comment: Thank you

author: Ayeni Olamilekan Ibrahim
comment: Very nice one

author: Muhwezi Fahad
comment: Awesome

author: Peyman Latafati
comment: Perfect

author: Robin Chen
comment: Finally, the stuff that made the original FS fun is back. While that stuff is great and all, the ads and some UI changes are so annoying. Before, it was displayed right after check-in, along with check-in updates.  Now it takes two clicks to load back into the main screen.  What's worse is that this abuses the users via accidentally clicking the ad. Second is tagging friends. Please make the done bar impassable. I've accidentally tagged recent friends so many times because the bar registers touches.

author: Robyn Francis
comment: Continuously getting CANNOT LOCATE error after choosing a location to check in to. Location services are on. This has been happening since September 2017. Uninstalled until fixed. Did try suggested route from dev and received no response. Guess my issue doesn't matter.

reply.author: Foursquare
reply.content: Hey Robyn, Thanks for reaching out! If you're having trouble checking in please send your account info to support@foursquare.com so the team can let you know if your account has been flagged.

author: Luis Outumuro
comment: It has been several years. Several annoyances (like no landscape mode, too easy to cheat the system, location algorithms are wonky) never addressed. Not very utilitarian (looks better than the functionality being delivered). Good luck, but time to move on.

author: Manda M.
comment: Normally I really love this app but since the latest update it seems to have had probs. For example the other day I checked in at a place I was standing at but recieved no points. Nor those points for upgraded stickers. Please fix as love this app.

author: Lisa Spann
comment: It's good but used to be better when you got rewards for checking in from the retailers. Now that never happens. More promo needed with retailers for the benefit. Facebook has taken over

author: Joris Berthelot
comment: Still bugged: the checking button always opens the latest check-in place instead of showing the places around. It's this app dead?

author: Dherik França
comment: Hi. I'm having some problems with the application. Since last actualisation, when I try to do check in appear the message "We can't find you! There was an error loading your location, check your internet connection please!". I tried to do check in using WiFi or mobile data but it's happening all the time. What is the problem and how can I fix it? Thank you!

author: Raúl Keller
comment: I didn't mind that one app became two so much, but now that you can't tag fb friends that are not on Swarm, I am dissatisfied.

author: Bobby Gonzales
comment: No more fun. Continuously "error loading your location".

author: Maneesh Nisargand
comment: Recent app update seems to be deleting older check-ins (e.g. since mid-January) each time I do a new check-in, and seem to be losing my history accordingly

author: Ahmed Albaqawi
comment: Why does it crash every time i click on a message?

author: Евгений Бубенщиков
comment: Again, battery drain, a lot of wakelocks((
Şu swarmı düzeltin artık arkadaş

author: Andrew A
comment: Love swarm but where are the long press short cuts? Would be nice to long press on swarm and check-in

author: Trần Như Duy
comment: Usually crash.

author: Larry Francy
comment: Works good for me now.

author: TwoBeardGamer
comment: Why get rid of the widget? I loved it.

author: Fenty ID
comment: OK

author: kissykennysmatt
comment: Recommendable

author: Dmitry Konovalov
comment: After large update some time ago the motivation system became very strange. I don't understand why do I need coins and how to spend it.
